          <title>
            <string language="fr">L'intérieur de la Terre</string>
            <string language="en">The Earth's interior</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Innere der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O interior da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'interiore della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το γήινο εσωτερικό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El interior de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme montre les couches pleines et liquides de l'intérieur de la terre.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the solid and liquid layers of the Earth's interior.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die festen und flüssigen 
Schichten des Innerens der Masse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra as camadas contínuas e 
líquidas do interior da terra.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra gli strati liquidi solidi e 
dell'interiore della terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει στερεά και υγρά στρώματα
του γήινου εσωτερικού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra las capas sólidas y
